database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: GNPS - Actinobacteria - 1000Strains
entry.description: A semi-random selection of 1000 marine Actinobacteria strains from the Jensen Lab strain lists. Approximately one fifth are suspected Streptomycetes, the rest are less characterized Actinomycetes. Selection was random except that Salinispora strains were avoided.
